title: Template
description: Describes configuration for a generator template

placeholders.description: Placeholder values used in templates. These will be replace with values passed to the generator.

defaultValues.description: Default values used for the generated files

directory.description: Relative path to the directory of template files.

TemplatePlaceholder.description: Value used as a placeholder value in generator files. If this is a string, the other values will be generated automatically.

kebabCase.description: Placeholder value in `kebab-case`. This will be replaced with a `kebab-case` version of the value passed to the generator.

camelCase.description: Placeholder value in `camelCase`. This will be replaced with a `camelCase` version of the value passed to the generator.

pascalCase.description: Placeholder value in `PascalCase`. This will be replaced with a `PascalCase` version of the value passed to the generator.

snakeCase.description: Placeholder value in `snake_case`. This will be replaced with a `snake_case` version of the value passed to the generator.

upperSnakeCase.description: Placeholder value in `UPPER_SNAKE_CASE`. This will be replaced with an `UPPER_SNAKE_CASE` version of the value passed to the generator.

passthrough.description: Placeholder value used to specify that the value passed to the generator should be used as is.

TemplateValue.description: Value used for the generated files
